card.name: Ms. Marvel
card.property: "Morphogenetics" â€” Response: After you play an [[Attack]], [[Thwart]], or [[Defense]] event, exhaust Ms. Marvel â†’ return that event to your hand.
"You can call me Ms. Marvel. And if you cooperate, I won't throw you again."

alternate.name: Kamala Khan
alternate.property: Teen Spirit â€” Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a Ms. Marvel card, then add that card to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
"I want to be beautiful and awesome and buttkicking and less complicated"

card.name: Red Dagger
card.property: Interrupt: When Red Dagger is defeated, spend 2 resources of different types â†’ deal 2 damage to an enemy and return Red Dagger to your hand.
"Karachi is my home. I patrol these neighborhoods."

card.name: Big Hands
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
"This hand thing... is getting out of hand..." -- Ms. Marvel

card.name: Sneak By
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme.
"This is my whole life in one garbage metaphor." -- Kamala Khan

card.name: Wiggle Room
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. Draw 1 card.
"Since we're just getting to know each other, a little FYI: I don't like being taken by surprise!" -- Ms. Marvel

card.name: Aamir Khan
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Aamir Khan â†’ place 1 card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck, then draw 1 card.
"Are you okay? I mean, aside from being in the worst trouble of your life?"

card.name: Bruno Carrelli
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Bruno Carrelli â†’ attach 1 card from your hand facedown here. Action: Exhaust Bruno Carrelli â†’ add up to 3 cards attached here to your hand.

card.name: Nakia Bahadir
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Nakia Bahadir â†’ reduce the cost of the next card you play this phase by 1.
"You're too sweet, squishy muffin. You give people way too much credit." -- Nakia Bahadir

card.name: Biokinetic Polymer Suit
card.property: Hero Resource: Exhaust Biokinetic Polymer Suit â†’ generate a [wild] resource for an event.
"What about that polymer you were working on for the scholarship? The super snot?" -- Kamala Khan

card.name: Embiggen!
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you play an [[Attack]] event, exhaust Embiggen! â†’ increase the amount of damage that event deals by 2.
"EMBIGGEN!" -- Ms. Marvel

card.name: Shrink
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you play a [[Thwart]] event, exhaust Shrink â†’ increase the amount of threat that event removes by 2.
"Shrink, shrink, shrink!" -- Ms. Marvel

card.name: Nova
card.property: Interrupt: When an enemy initiates an attack against you, spend a [energy] resource â†’ deal 2 damage to that enemy.
"I guess my mom was wrong. All those years of playing video games did pay off!."

card.name: Preemptive Strike
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When a boost card is turned face up while the villain attacks, cancel all boost icons on that card. Then deal 1 damage to the villain for each boost icon cancelled this way.

card.name: Tackle
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Stun an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, deal 3 damage to that enemy.
That's gonna hurt in the morning.

card.name: Energy Barrier
card.property: Uses (3 reflection counters). Interrupt When you would take any amount of damage, remove 1 reflection counter from here â†’ prevent 1 of that damage and deal 1 damage to that enemy.

card.name: Enhanced Reflexes
card.property: Uses (3 energy counters). Hero Resource: Exhaust Enhanced Reflexes and remove 1 energy counter from it â†’ generate a [energy] resource.

card.name: Lockjaw
card.property: You may play Lockjaw from your discard pile during your turn (paying his resource cost).
"Uhhh... hold on, Bruno. I think my new dog just teleported into my room." -- Kamala Khan

card.name: Endurance
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. You get +3 hit points.

card.name: Melee
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Deal 3 damage to another enemy.

card.name: Concussive Blow
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Confuse an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, deal 3 damage to that enemy.

card.name: Morale Boost
card.property: Hero Action: Choose a hero. Until the end of the round, that hero gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF
"This is a stand I need to take. This time, no compromises." -- Sam Wilson

card.name: Down Time
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Your alter-ego gets +2 REC.
"We should do this more often."

card.name: Home by Dawn
card.property: Give to the Kamala Khan player You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Kamala Khan â†’ remove Home by Dawn from the game. - Discard 1 PERSONA support you control. If no support was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Generation Why?
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the top card of each player's deck for each ally and [[Persona]] support in play.
The Inventor has convinced the youth of Jersey City that they should serve as human batteries for his experiments

card.name: Thomas Edison
card.property: Thomas Edison cannot take damage while you are engaged with another minion. (Ms. Marvel's nemesis minion.)
"I AM NOT A BIRD!"

card.name: Edison's Giant Robot
card.property: Edison's Giant Robot cannot take damage. Hero Action: Spend a [mental] resource -> until the end of the phase, treat this card's printed text box as if it were blank.

card.name: Harvest
card.property: When Revealed: Exhaust each [[Persona]] support in play. For each support exhaust this way, the villain heals 1 damage. If no [[Persona]] support was exhausted this way, this card gains surge.
